text:
1. Sit at the piano bench.
2. Place hands on the piano keys.
3. Press the keys to produce sound.
4. Move fingers across the keys to play different notes.
5. Use the pedals to control sustain and other effects.
6. Read sheet music or play by memory.
7. Coordinate hand movements to play melody and chords.
8. Follow the rhythm and tempo of the music.
9. Express emotions and dynamics through playing.
10. Practice and refine technique to improve proficiency.
